        public CarVolumeGroupInfo build()
        Builds the instance.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if min volume gain index is larger than max volume gain index, or if the volume gain index is outside the range of max and min volume gain index.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the constructor is re-used
